headline: Does L3Harris Still Offer Value After Its Strong 2025 Rally and Contract Momentum?
summary: If you have been wondering whether L3Harris Technologies is still good value after its run up, this breakdown will help you decide if the current price reflects its long term potential or if the market is getting ahead of itself. Even after a recent pullback of 3.8% over the last week and 2.4% over the last month, the stock is still up 34.4% year to date and 34.9% over the past year, hinting that investors have been steadily re-rating its prospects. That momentum has been supported by a...
